participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, Emily is passionate about storytelling and enjoys immersing herself in the worlds she creates.
participant_1.background: I'm currently unemployed so I have time to write. After finishing my career, I discovered that I'm not that passionate about it. I want to become an author. I'm writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake loves music and gaming, and he is always eager to try new things.
participant_2.background: My horse never talks back to me. I'm the lead singer for an indie band. I'm still a student, but I'm gonna be a nurse. I enjoy Budweiser beer.

content.text: I am writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.
That's great! What's it about?
It's a fantasy novel about a young woman who discovers she has magic powers.
That sounds really cool! I love fantasy novels.
Thanks! I'm having a lot of fun writing it.
I can imagine. Writing a novel takes a lot of time and effort, but it's so rewarding when you finish it.
It is. I'm really excited to see how it turns out.
I'm sure it will be great!
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for a living?
Right now I'm unemployed, but I'm hoping to get a job as a writer after I finish my novel.
That's great! I'm sure you'll find a job.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
Me too! I love reading and playing video games.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite genre is probably adventure games.
Me too! I love adventure games. They're so much fun.
Yeah, they are. I love the feeling of exploring a new world and solving puzzles.
Me too. It's like being on an adventure yourself.
Exactly! That's what I love about them.
